#cloud-config
hostname: HOSTNAME_PLACEHOLDER
packages:
 - binutils
 - diffstat
 - chrpath
 - g++
 - make
 - texinfo
 - python3-lockfile
 - python3-pip
users:
 - name: cibot
   gecos: CI bot
   lock_passwd: true
   homedir: /data/cibot
 - name: rojkov
   gecos: Dmitry Rozhkov
   sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
   groups: sudo
   shell: /bin/bash
   lock_passwd: true
   ssh-authorized-keys:
    - ssh-rsa  rojkov@hpenvy
disk_setup:
  /dev/sdc:
    table_type: mbr
    layout:
      - [ 19, 82 ]
      - [ 90, 83 ]
    overwrite: False
fs_setup:
  - label: data0
    filesystem: ext2
    device: /dev/sdc2
  - label: swap
    filesystem: swap
    device: /dev/sdc1
mounts:
 - [ //STORAGE_NAME.file.core.windows.net/bbcache, /fileshare, cifs, "vers=3.0,username=STORAGE_USERNAME,password=STORAGE_PASSWORD,dir_mode=0777,file_mode=0777" ]
 - [ /dev/sdc1, swap, swap, defaults ]
 - [ /dev/sdc2, /data, ext2, defaults ]
runcmd:
 - [ mount, /fileshare, -o, "uid=cibot,forceuid,gid=cibot,forcegid" ]
 - [ pip3, install, azure-storage ]
write_files:
 - encoding: b64
   content: TASKDATA_PLACEHOLDER
   owner: root:root
   path: /etc/taskdata.json
   permissions: '0444'
